ud3.6:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud3.6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā pilindavaccho bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarati.
ud3.6:1.4: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
ud3.6:1.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
ud3.6:2.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi:
ud3.6:2.2: “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena pilindavacchaṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantehi:
ud3.6:2.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā pilindavaccho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ pilindavacchaṃ etadavoca:
ud3.6:3.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā pilindavaccho tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
ud3.6:3.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ pilindavacchaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
ud3.6:3.3: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, vaccha, bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarasī”ti?
ud3.6:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato pilindavacchassa pubbenivāsaṃ manasi karitvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
ud3.6:4.2: “mā kho tumhe, bhikkhave, vacchassa bhikkhuno ujjhāyittha.
ud3.6:4.3: Na, bhikkhave, vaccho dosantaro bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarati.
ud3.6:4.4: Vacchassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pañca jātisatāni abbokiṇṇāni brāhmaṇakule paccājātāni.
ud3.6:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
ud3.6:6.4: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti.
